summary:
First of all, I wish you all a happy new year and great things for 2025, the most important one being having a good health. 
Like last year, let’s do a quick recap of last year and try to (slightly) plan for the new one. 
2024 in a nutshell
On this blog
In 2024, I wrote 67 posts and it is by far the year I wrote the most...
title: 2024 in review and plan for 2025

title: Elon Musk and the right’s war on Wikipedia
